mil7.8.1:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘kumbhassa ekam angam gahetabban’ti yam vadesi, katamam tam ekam angam gahetabban”ti?
mil7.8.1:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena agame adhigame pariyattiyam samanne paramim patva na sanitabbam, na tena mano karaniyo, na dabbo dassetabbo, nihatamanena nihatadabbena bhavitabbam, ujukena amukharena avikatthina.
mil7.8.1:1.4: Idam, maharaja, kumbhassa ekam angam gahetabbam.
